DOC.brief_summary: The objective STRESS trial investigate mode action set effect Zeller Entspannung film coat tablet saliva cortisol response versus Placebo acute stress healthy male volunteer . In addition , data safety tolerability Zeller Entspannung obtain . A third arm include treatment test well . Approximately 72 healthy volunteer include randomize , double blind study . Study duration 7 day , study medication intake 4 day : participant take medication one tablet three time day ( morning , midday , even ) first 3 day , whereas day 4 two tablet take ( morning midday ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Zeller Entspannung Film Coated Tablets Acute Stress
DOC.criteria: Age:18 45 year Written inform consent Male gender Any acute chronic somatic psychiatric disorder Smoking Any clinically relevant hepatic disorder Any clinically relevant renal disorder Any clinically relevant cardiac disorder Any clinically relevant respiratory disease ( e.g . Asthma ) Diabetes mellitus Any abnormal lab value suggest disease exclusion criterion Known allergy trial medication excipients Alcohol drug abuse ( e.g . cannabis ) Concomitant participation another clinical trial < 4 week ago Participation psychotherapy Already participate TSST
